definition: introduced from another region and persisting without cultivation
details:
adjective
- introduced from another region and persisting without cultivation
= synonyms: naturalized
- brought about or set up or accepted
= example: brought about or set up or accepted
= synonyms: constituted
- conforming with accepted standards
= synonyms: conventional
- shown to be valid beyond a reasonable doubt
= example: shown to be valid beyond a reasonable doubt
- settled securely and unconditionally
= synonyms: accomplished
